metadata.title: CVE-2022-48632 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: i2c:mlxbf: prevent stack overflow in mlxbf_i2c_smbus_start_transaction()memcpy() is called in a loop while 'operation->length' upper bound is notchecked and 'data_idx' also increments.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
